name: Literally Free Will (From Prison)
description:
LITERALLY FREE WILL (from prison)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was completed in <48 hours for the IRXJam17, using the required theme of 'free will'.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you have the willpower to free Will from prison?

Play through 8 levels of this highly-ambitious multi-genre multiple-ending adventure! Featuring:

  • Multiple playable characters! Play as Dill, Will's childhood best friend, as he goes on a quest to break Will free from prison. Play Will as he tries to escape. Maybe you'll even get to play as an orca?
  • Multiple levels and genres! Jump (fly?) through Willow Forest, sneak through Silent Will, click through a cool interactive story, plus a secret space level if you make it to the end! And wait, does the shape of the Silent Will level spell 'WILL'?
  • Power-ups! Turn invisible using Willusion, or take a Will Pill to boost your Willpower levels.
  • Enemies! Adventure your way past generic prison guards, baby guards (it was bring your child to work day), and members of the Silent Will organisation, such as Will Gates, Willy Ray Cyrus, and Willary Clinton.
  • Deep story! Are you just saving Will from a physical prison? Or a metaphorical one as well? Will Will have the willpower to find reclaim his will from the Will imposters of Silent Will?
  • Moral choices! Use your free will to make different key choices in the story!
  • Original soundtrack! Featuring classics such as 'willow_forest_music_02.mp3' and 'credits_screen_flamenco_music_draft.wav'.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • Use your mouse to click through the interactive story!
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move in the Silent Will and space levels!
  • Use A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to move left/right in the platformer levels, and W/Up arrow key to jump!
  • If you want to skip a level, you can press P!
